Rules.Line1: Roll dice to reach 21 without going over
Rules.Line2: Choose your risk: d4 is safe, d20 is dangerous
Rules.Line3: Hold when you're satisfied with your total

Profile.Title: Profile
Profile.Instruction: Who do you want to read?
Profile.Effect: Success: Startling insight! Reveals IF they have cheated (Yes/No).

Goad.Title: Goad
Goad.SuccessEffect: Target must HIT (any die) or FOLD!
Goad.BackfireEffect: You pay 1x Ante + become DARED (Must Hit d8 (Free) or Fold)!

Bump.Title: Bump the Table
Bump.DieHint: Target: Visible dice OR hole die!
Bump.FailureEffect: Failure: You become LOCKED until they retaliate!

Accuse.Title: Accuse
Accuse.Instruction: Select which die to accuse on {name}:
Accuse.Note: Note: Even if they cheated on another die, accusing the wrong one fails!

Payment.Title: Payment Method
Payment.ShiftHint: Hold SHIFT to show this menu when you have gold.

Notifications.GMRequired: A GM must be connected to play.
Notifications.CaughtBumping: You were caught bumping! Wait for retaliation.
Notifications.DaredForced: You are Dared! You forced to roll a d8 (Free) or Fold.
Notifications.HunchLockedD20: Foresight locked you into rolling a d20!
Notifications.CutOffNoTab: You're cut off and can't put it on the tab.
Notifications.NoCheatDice: You have no dice to cheat with!
Notifications.CannotCheatBlind: You cannot cheat a blind die.
Notifications.NoAccuseDice: That player has no dice to accuse.
Notifications.NoSideBetTargets: No valid players to bet on.
Notifications.AnteRange: Ante must be between 1 and 1000 gp
Notifications.GMOnlyModeChange: Only the GM can change game mode.
Notifications.GMOnlyHeatChange: Only the GM can change starting heat.
Notifications.GMOnlyThemeChange: Only the GM can change the table theme.

Dialogs.ResetTableBody: Clear all players and reset the table?

GMJoin.TitlePrompt: How would you like to join?
GMJoin.WalletHint: This is tracked by the module (not the actor sheet)
GMJoin.SelectNpcHint: Tip: Select an NPC token on the canvas first to play as that character.

GoblinHold.Prompt: Hold to lock in your score, or continue to keep the Chamber moving.

Logs.PrivacyNote: Private logs are hidden from other players in the UI, but GMs can inspect world state data.

Theme.Title: Table Theme
Theme.GoblinDenDesc: Grimy, chaotic, stained with ale & worse
